documentation.text:
@dev Contract module which allows children to implement an emergency stop
 mechanism that can be triggered by an authorized account.
 This module is used through inheritance. It will make available the
 modifiers `whenNotStopped` and `whenStopped`, which can be applied to
 the functions of your contract. Note that they will not be stopped by
 simply including this module, only once the modifiers are put in place.
@dev Emitted when the stop is triggered by `account`.
@dev Initializes the contract in unstopped state.
@dev Returns true if the contract is stopped, and false otherwise.

@dev Triggers stopped state.
 Once stopped, the contract can not be started again.
 Requirements:
 - The contract must not be stopped.

devdoc.details: Contract module which allows children to implement an emergency stop mechanism that can be triggered by an authorized account. This module is used through inheritance. It will make available the modifiers `whenNotStopped` and `whenStopped`, which can be applied to the functions of your contract. Note that they will not be stopped by simply including this module, only once the modifiers are put in place.

Stopped(address).details: Emitted when the stop is triggered by `account`.

constructor.details: Initializes the contract in unstopped state.

stopped().details: Returns true if the contract is stopped, and false otherwise.
